<table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" border="0"><tbody><tr class="headline" data-accno="phli000020020811dy8b00012"><td valign="top"><input type="checkbox" id="phli000020020811dy8b00012" name="hdl" value="{12:0,0:&quot;phli000020020811dy8b00012&quot;,1:0,2:&quot;en&quot;,3:{0:&quot;Article&quot;},5:&quot;drn:archive.newsarticle.phli000020020811dy8b00012&quot;,6:&quot;  'Mentally retarded' stirs war of words&quot;,7:1,9:&quot;phli&quot;,11:1}" cat="Article" data-metrics-data="{&quot;An&quot;:&quot;phli000020020811dy8b00012&quot;,&quot;Hdl&quot;:&quot;\u0026#39;Mentally retarded\u0026#39; stirs war of words&quot;,&quot;Au&quot;:&quot;By Stacey Burling&quot;,&quot;Ct&quot;:&quot;PUBLICATIONS&quot;,&quot;At&quot;:&quot;ARTICLE&quot;,&quot;Wc&quot;:&quot;1106&quot;,&quot;Sc&quot;:&quot;PHLI_ The Philadelphia Inquirer &quot;,&quot;Bl&quot;:&quot;en&quot;,&quot;Pd&quot;:&quot;11 August 2002&quot;}"></td><td valign="top" class="count">1.&nbsp;&nbsp;</td><td valign="top"><img title="Factiva Licensed Content" src="../img/Pub_Licensed.gif"><a href="../du/article.aspx/?accessionno=phli000020020811dy8b00012&amp;drn=drn:archive.newsarticle.phli000020020811dy8b00012&amp;fcpil=en&amp;napc=S&amp;sa_from=&amp;cat=a&amp;page_driver=searchBuilder_Search" class="enHeadline" onclick="article_click(this,'phli000020020811dy8b00012','drn:archive.newsarticle.phli000020020811dy8b00012');return false">  'Mentally retarded' stirs war of words</a><div class="leadFields"><a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="var RIND=window.RIND||window.parent.RIND;RIND.getEntityDetails('','phli','sc','False', '', window.onPopupClose);return false;;return false;"> The Philadelphia Inquirer </a>, 11 August 2002, 1106 words, (English)</div><div class="snippet ensnippet">  
To thousands of people, mentally and retarded are fighting words.
 
For years, people who are mentally retarded, their families, and
professionals who work with them have been wrangling over what to call
people with IQs below 70.</div>
